question: Who among the following was the author of the epic poem "Amuktamalayada"?
explanation: The Tuluva dynasty ruler, Sri Krishna Dev Raya (1509-1529 AD) composed the epic poem, \'Amuktamalyada\' ( in telugu) that tells the well-known story of the daughter of Periazhvar, Goda Devi, who used to wear the garlands intended for Lord Ranganatha before they were offered to the deity and thus known as â€˜Amukta Malya Da\' (one who wears and gives away garlands).
